How can I get involved with Verus Coin?

You can get involved with Verus Coin by visiting their website at https://veruscoin.io and joining their Discord community at https://discord.gg/VRKMP2S. These resources provide a gateway to connect with the Verus Coin community, learn more about the project, and get involved in various ways.
